title.wouldLikeToTalkTo: I Would you like to talk to
title.isidore: , by Philip K. Dick, the main character, Jack Isidore, talks about his need four types of women to be balanced:
title.creative: a creative woman to stimulate his mind,
title.spirituelle: and a woman who shares his philosophical beliefs.
title.idee: This idea illustrates the complexities and contradictions of human psychology that are often explored in the works of Philip K. Dick.
title.appli_equi: The Equilibre application allows you to chat with the profile of a person who matches your current state of mind.
title.whoYouWantToTalk: Who would you like to chat with?

horde_api.getKey: get your personal api key from horde
horde_api.accelerate: to speed up the generation of text and images, and save it in your browser
horde_api.keyActive: Your Horde API key is active.
horde_api.more_horde_info: more info on how the horde works
horde_api.explanation1: to obtain a Horde API key, by clicking on
horde_api.explanation2: which will allow you to be prioritized and generate text and images faster. For the API, it is not necessary to connect to one of the indicated providers. You just have to indicate a user name (Display Name) and note the code which will be generated in the orange banner, copy it. Keep this code in a corner and insert it into the `API key` input field on the page

spirituelle.description: This woman shares the values, beliefs, and worldview of the individual. She offers a deep connection on the philosophical and spiritual plane.
spirituelle.action: Chat with a woman with philosophical beliefs
